comment.author: 86886338@N00
comment._content: The Human race is the only race and Jazz musicians understood that. I believe that was one reason ''polite white society'', when I was growing up in the 50s, looked upon Jazz with derision. I was at the U. of Wisconsin before I even heard the name John Coltrane. And then I couldn't hear enough Jazz and Blues.
